title: Rukh Egg

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Generate (Red) each night.
- (Red)(3): While dead, transform into a 1891B Rukh and revive yourself after the night ends.

desc:
Post 1891
*Called “stonefeathers” by many lowlanders, rukhs are thought to descend from a phoenix that sacrificed its flame for a body of stone.*
